version_name: 6.0.0:Say goodbye to "China Air Quality Index". Introducing our new name "Air Matters"
6.0.0:Say goodbye to "China Air Quality Index". Introducing our new name "Air Matters"

version_description:
- New look for Dashboard and data history.
- Added Pollen Data in Germany, Austria and Switzerland.
- Support Philips AC1214 air purifier.
- Improved VoiceOver support.
- Improved App launch time.
- Fixed a bug preventing response when tapp

- New look for Dashboard and data history.
- Added Pollen Data in Germany, Austria and Switzerland.
- Support Philips AC1214 air purifier.
- Improved VoiceOver support.
- Improved App launch time.
- Fixed a bug preventing response when tapp

- Added Air Quality Index standards for Netherlands and Europe (CAQI).

Recent updates:

- New look for Dashboard and data history.
- Added Pollen Data in Germany, Austria and Switzerland.
- Support Philips AC1214 air purifier.
- Impr

- Added Air Quality Index standards for Netherlands and Europe (CAQI).

Recent updates:

- New look for Dashboard and data history.
- Added Pollen Data in Germany, Austria and Switzerland.
- Support Philips AC1214 air purifier.
- Impr

- Added language support for Spanish, Italian, Dutch, Romanian, Russian.
- Fixed a bug causing air quality map to display air quality index in a wrong standard.
- Fixed a bug that fails to load air quality details when using 12-hour time.
- Added

- New setting: choose primary index from air quality, allergy risk, or let our servers decide for you automatically.
- Added switches for air quality / allergy alert subscriptions.
- Now you can set the app icon to “Mask Man”, the old icon we used i

- Support 352 M25 air monitor (Mainland China only).
- Improved network performance and stability.
- Fixed a Today widget layout bug when set to "Show Less".
- Fixed a display issue for Air Quality Ranking on iOS 9.

- 支持飞利浦 GoPure 7101 车载净化器.
- App 图标新增了两个色彩主题.
- 修复了 iPad 上截图可能导致程序崩溃的问题.
- 修复了一些翻译错误.

- 支持飞利浦 GoPure 7101 车载净化器.
- App 图标新增了两个色彩主题.
- 修复了 iPad 上截图可能导致程序崩溃的问题.
- 修复了一些翻译错误.

- 修复了部分用户无法启动 app 的问题. 抱歉.
- 新增 9 种语言的支持：保加利亚语, 捷克语, 丹麦语, 芬兰语, 匈牙利语, 马来语, 波兰语, 瑞典语, 泰语.

近期更新:
- 支持飞利浦 GoPure 7101 车载净化器.
- 优化了镭豆和 352 监测器的访问速度.

- 修复了部分用户无法启动 app 的问题. 抱歉.

- 支持 iPhone X, 非常抱歉让你们久等了.
- 优化了启动与运行速度, 减少了 App 大小; 桌面组件与 Apple Watch App 的稳定性也得到了提升.

# 近期更新

- 增加了推送通知的自定义界面.
- 修复了切换空气质量标准导致的显示问题.
- 修复了与飞利浦空气净化器相关的问题.

- 完全适配 iOS 12 与 watchOS 5, 支持各种新型号的 iPhone 与 Apple Watch.
- 我们重新设计了 Apple Watch App, 提供了包括空气与天气预报在内的更加丰富的信息.
- 增加了 Siri Shortcuts 的支持, 可以通过 Siri 查看您的所在地和收藏地点的空气质量，或者查看空气质量监测器的最新数据.
- 现在您可以使用二维码向家人或朋友分享空气质量监测器的数据.
